content.question: By 1830 revolutions in the Atlantic world resulted in which of the following changes?

choices.label: The political independence of colonies in both North and South America
The emancipation of slaves everywhere in the Atlantic world
Political and economic domination of the Western Hemisphere by the United States
The creation of a politically unified South America

content.answer: The political independence of colonies in both North and South America

topic.text: 5.2: Nationalism and Revolutions in the Period from 1750 to 1900

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
